SEARCH

Class CashRegister

java.lang.Object
CashRegister
public class CashRegister extends Object
This class represents the cash register inside a regular vending machine.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CashRegister()
    This method creates an instance of CashRegister.

  • Constructor Details

    • CashRegister

      public CashRegister()
      This method creates an instance of CashRegister. It instantiates a new ArrayList of Money Objects and initializes the values in tally hashmaps to zero.

  • Method Details

    • computeChangeDenomination

      public void computeChangeDenomination(int amntInserted, int subtotal, int n)
      This function computes for the denominations of change and stores the count in the denominations HashMap of this class.
      Parameters:
      amntInserted - the amount inserted by the user into the vending machine
      subtotal - the total price the user has to pay
      n - the number of money types

    • getDenominationStartingFrom

      public void getDenominationStartingFrom(int key, int number)
      This method gets the denomination for a specified amount starting from a given key
      Parameters:
      key - the given key to start from
      number - the number to achieve in denominations

    • getDenominationForKey

      public int getDenominationForKey(int key, int totalAmount)
      This method gets the denomination using a given key (type of bill) for money HashMap and the total amount to achieve in denominations
      Parameters:
      key - the key to use for money HashMap
      totalAmount - the total amount to achieve in denominations
      Returns:
      the remaining amount left the achieve in denominations after deducting the key from original amount as much as possible

    • computeTotalChange

      public int computeTotalChange()
      This method computes for the total change based on denomination HashMap.
      Returns:
      the total change based on the quantities stored in denomination HashMap

    • computeInsertedAmount

      public int computeInsertedAmount(int[] inserted)
      This method computes the total inserted amount by the user given an integer array containing the quantities of each bill and coin.
      Parameters:
      inserted - the integer array containing the quantities for each bill and coin inserted by user
      Returns:
      the total inserted amount

    • resetDenominations

      public void resetDenominations()
      This method resets all denominations to zero, and used after completing a purchase.

    • clearCashRegister

      public void clearCashRegister()
      This method clears the values of money hashmap by setting the quantity of all bills and coins to 0

    • addMoney

      public void addMoney(int[] moneyQty)
      This method accepts an integer array containing quantity of all coins and bills and adds it to current qty stored in money HashMap
      Parameters:
      moneyQty - the integer array containing the quantities all types of bills and coins

    • addBill

      public void addBill(int key, int qty)
      This method adds to the quantity of a single type of coin or bill
      Parameters:
      key - the key to use as reference in money HashMap and value to use in money instantiation
      qty - the quantity to add to the value at specified key in money HashMap and number of money objects to instantiate

    • deductChangeFromMoneyTally

      public void deductChangeFromMoneyTally()
      This method deducts the corresponding values in denominations HashMap from the values stored in money HashMap

    • deductBill

      public void deductBill(int key, int qty)
      This method deducts the qty of a single type of coin or bill given the money HashMap key and a quantity
      Parameters:
      key - the given key to use as reference in money HashMap
      qty - the quantity to add the value stored in the given key in money HashMap

    • searchMoney

      public int searchMoney(double moneyValue)
      This method returns the index of the first Money object in money ArrayList with the specified value.
      Parameters:
      moneyValue - the value attribute to search for
      Returns:
      the index of the Money object

    • getMoneyQty

      public int[] getMoneyQty()
      This method returns an integer array containing the quantity of each type of bill and coin stored in money HashMap
      Returns:
      the integer array containing quantities

    • isMoneyQtyValid

      public boolean isMoneyQtyValid(int qty)
      This method checks if a given money quantity is valid. Valid values are positive values.
      Parameters:
      qty - the given quantity to check
      Returns:
      true if the quantity is valid, false if it is not

    • isChangeEnough

      public boolean isChangeEnough(int subtotal, int amountInserted)
      This method checks if the change in the vending machine is enough given the subtotal and amount inserted by the suer.
      Parameters:
      subtotal - the total price the user has to pay
      amountInserted - the total amount the user inserted
      Returns:
      true if change in vending machine is enough, false if it is not

    • isCashRegEmpty

      public boolean isCashRegEmpty()
      This method checks if the money HashMap is empty.
      Returns:
      true if all values in money HashMap are zero, false if not.

    • isAmountInsertedEnough

      public boolean isAmountInsertedEnough(int subtotal, int amount)
      This ethod checks if the amount inserted by user is enough to pay for his subtotal give the total amount inserted and the subtotal
      Parameters:
      subtotal - the user's subtotal
      amount - the total amount user inserted
      Returns:
      false if amount is less than subtotal, true otherwise

    • toStringBillDenomination

      public String toStringBillDenomination(double key, int qty)
      This method displays the denomination for one type of bill or coin. This method is used in displayTotalChange() as well.
      Parameters:
      key - the type of bill or coin
      qty - the quantity of bill or coin
      Returns:
      a String simulating the dispensing of the key and qty

    • dispenseTotalChange

      public String dispenseTotalChange()
      This method returns a String containing information on the total change after a purchase.
      Returns:
      String indicating all money dispensed

    • toStringAmount

      public String toStringAmount(int[] amount)
      This method returns a String indicating the quantity of all bill and coin types given an integer array containing the corresponding quantities
      Parameters:
      amount - he integer array containing the quantities for each bill and coin
      Returns:
      the String simulating the dispensing of money and their quantities

    • collectMoney

      public boolean collectMoney(int[] qty)
      This method collects money from the vending machine given the quantities of each money type
      Parameters:
      qty - an integer array containing the quantities corresponding to each money type
      Returns:
      true if money collection is successful, false if not

    • gatherMoney

      public boolean gatherMoney(int amount)
      This method gathers and computes the denominations for a specified amount
      Parameters:
      amount - the specified amount to compute denominations for
      Returns:
      true if cash register has enough money to form the amount, false if not

    • updateMoneyTally

      public void updateMoneyTally(HashMap<Integer,Integer> tally)
      this method updates the value of the money tally hashmap given a hashmap containing updated tally values
      Parameters:
      tally - the hashmap containing updated values

    • updateDenominationsTally

      public void updateDenominationsTally(HashMap<Integer,Integer> tally)
      this method updates the value of the denominations tally hashmap given a hashmap containing updated tally values
      Parameters:
      tally - the hashmap containing updated values

    • updateMoney

      public void updateMoney(ArrayList<Money> money)
      This method updates the current container of Money objects given a new, updated container of Money
      Parameters:
      money - the new ArrayList of Money objects

    • getMoneyTally

      public HashMap<Integer,Integer> getMoneyTally()
      This method returns the current tally of money in the cash register
      Returns:
      HashMap containing money quantities per key or type

    • getDenoTally

      public HashMap<Integer,Integer> getDenoTally()
      This method returns the current computed denominations in the cash register
      Returns:
      HashMap containing current computed denominations

    • getMoney

      public ArrayList<Money> getMoney()
      This method returns the container or ArrayList of Money Objects
      Returns:
      the container or ArrayList of Money Objects
